name: Randomon
description:
Randomon is a monster-collecting game in which you take photographs of more than half a million procedurally-generated monsters.

Appease an old man that is really just confused why a woman keeps barreling into his home asking for camera film.

And "fill up" your Randex which keeps track of every monster you've successfully photographed.

How to play: 

In the overworld screens, look for and click jiggling grass. It contains a Randomon! 

When zoomed in, take a photo of the Randomon when it leaves the safety of grass and exposes itself!

You will return to an old man's house when you run out of film. He will boot you to a new location to take more photos of more Randomon. More!

Credits: 

Allison James made the game and has carpal tunnel from the hours and hours of data input and artwork, bless her heart. She is sick of this stupid game
